Dungeons & Daddies

Dungeons and Daddies is the perfect podcast for anyone who is not a stickler for the rules. Iâ€™ve been listening to this podcast for years and I am pretty sure that none of the players have ever bothered to learn the rules of the game. But that is what makes this podcast so enjoyable.

The first season of this show follows the misadventures of 4 dads from our world flung into the Forgotten Realms to rescue their missing sons. Rife with dad jokes and ridiculousness, this is the perfect podcast for anyone looking for a belly laugh. And to remind people that you can enjoy D&D without following the rules to the letter.
